charges.charge_description: COUNT I:  Conspiracy to knowingly and intentionally possess with intent to distribute and to distribute a controlled substance, namely: in excess of 100 grams of a mixture or substance containing a detectable amount of heroin, a Schedule I Controlled Substance, in violation of 21 USC 841(a)(1) and (b)(1)(B)(i)  and 846

charges.charge_offence_description: COUNT I:  Conspiracy to knowingly and intentionall
